script: There is a Playground in the center of my hometown.
Retail Area is a location in my home town, it is 2 KM, East from Playground.
And finally there is Statue of Founder which is South from Retail Area and 4 KM from it.
Given the points of interest that I have told you about, how would I travel from Playground to Statue of Founder following those interesting points?
expected_responses:
From Playground, go 2km East to Retail Area.
From Retail Area, go 4km South to Statue of Founder.
